title: If a supplement boosts your immune system is it also anti-inflammatory?
description: Answer (1 of 10): Firstly, you can't "boost" your immune system. The best you can do is give it what it needs in order that it can do its best. That being said, anything that gives your immune system what it needs is capable of being anti-inflammatory. However, not all supplements are. Also, part...
